titleStmt.title: A commentarie of M. Iohn Caluine vppon the Epistle to the Philippians wherein is set out the necessitie and profite of affliction vnto the faithfull, the benefite of God his word, the fruits, of vnitie and humilitie, free iustification by faith in Iesus Christ without our owne merites, the assurance, ioy, and contented mindes of the godlie, and their perseueraunce in godlinesse vnto the end. With many other comfortable and profitable pointes of religion. Translated out of Latine by W.B.
Commentarii in quatuor Pauli epistolas. English. Selections
titleStmt.author: Calvin, Jean, 1509-1564.
Becket, William, fl. 1584.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By John Windet] for Nicolas Lyng, and are to be sold at the west dore of S. Paules Church,

notesStmt.note: A translation of part of: Commentarii in quatuor Pauli epistolas.
Running title reads: A commentarie of I. Caluine, vpon the Philippians.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the west dore of S. Paules Church
